Summary: 5 discs flying in formation at just about sundown comingfrom direction of cecilfield nas
divs: Sighting Detailsmy dad had just pulled into the driveway, my mom and were on the small front poarch to greet him.the dog we had started to bark at the sky and we looked up--it was quiet and no sound at all-usually we heard lots of planes from the navy bases around us. when my dad looked up he told my mom to take me in the house but i wanted to stay and see too. all 3 of us watched thse discs fly very slowly,go back from the direction they came and go past us again--. they were at cloud level- passing in front and thru them. both my parents didt say very much to me-- but we went into the house locked all the doors and windows,and this was summer time i remember we were very warm. no lights of any kind were turned on and we slept with a with out a light.nothing was ever said about this until many years later after my dad had died and my mom and i sat for many hours talking of this--i really believe we have had and are having visits and i just want to know if possibles is there any explanation for what i saw.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Baldwin
There were no other sightings in Baldwin on or around September 11th 1952
